events.message: We have received the application from the candidate for the software engineer position. The resume indicates strong experience in backend development and cloud infrastructure.
The application has been categorized under Engineering due to the keywords 'software engineer' and 'cloud infrastructure' prominently featured in the candidate's resume.
A recruiter specializing in engineering hires has been assigned to this candidate to oversee the remainder of the hiring process and schedule interviews.
Initial phone screening completed where the candidate demonstrated strong understanding of microservices and DevOps practices. The interaction was very promising.
Technical interview with senior engineers has been scheduled for the candidate on 2024-05-06T15:00:00Z to further assess software development skills.
